bug.short_desc: Chart Web Project should be able to import latest chart component[13][0603]

long_desc.thetext:
Description: Charting Web Project should provide way to import latest chart runtime component Build number:2.3.0.v20080103
At present, BIRT Web Project is able to import runtime component from current BIRT build to replace with the old version. This function provides a way to update BIRT web project.
For Charting Web Project, similar function should be provided. Otherwise, user has to update the old chart runtime component through manually removing and pasting.
Fixed.Add a menu item in right-click pop up menu. Now Charting Web Project can import latest chart component.

Verify in build 2.3.0.v20080114
I have two charting web projects, one is created with BIRT2.2.2 build and the other is created with 2.3.0.v20080110 build.
Fail to import chart runtime components to both projects. The menu item is disabled.
So reopen it for fix.

Since i need to judge the project is Chart web project or birt web project, so i add a comment when building the chart web project for they are both dynamic web projects in fact. I knew the result as your description when i changed. The projects built before don't have that comment. So let me think through if there's a better solution again.
Fixed.Removed the judgement and comment to make sure other types of dynamic web projects can import chart runtime component.
